metadata.purpose: Training data for Brittney AI - multi-format HoloScript generation

samples.prompt: A glowing treasure chest that opens when grabbed, revealing gold coins inside with particle effects
A laser sword weapon with a glowing blade that makes a humming sound and leaves a trail when swung
samples.code:
@object LaserSword
  model: "cylinder"
  position: [0, 1, 0]
  scale: [0.05, 1.5, 0.05]
  material:
    color: "#2ecc71"
    emissive: "#27ae60"
    emissiveIntensity: 2
  equippable: true
  slot: "hand_right"
  audio:
    activate: "saber_on.wav"
    swing: "saber_swing.wav"
  onActivate: |
    this.visible = true
    audio.play("activate")

samples.prompt: A floating UI panel with health bar, score counter, and inventory slots
samples.code:
ui/FloatingPanel {
  position: [0, 5, -10]
  billboard: true
  size: [3, 0.4]
  material: 'glass_frosted'
  
  healthBar: {
    type: 'bar'
    current: player.health
    max: 100
    xPos: 0.2
    yOffset: -0.15
    width: 0.8
    color: [0.2, 0.8, 1]
  }
  
  scoreDisplay: {
    text: 'Score: {player.score}'
    xPos: 0.6
    fontSize: 24
    color: [1, 0.8, 0]
  }
}

samples.prompt: A campfire with animated flames, smoke particles, crackling audio, and warmth zone that heals players
samples.code:
object Campfire @collidable {
  model: 'campfire.glb'
  position: [5, 0.5, 0]

  particles FlameEffect {
    type: 'emissive'
    target: 'surface'
    color: '#8B47FF'
    count: 30
    velocity: [0, 1, 0]
    size: 0.2
    lifetime: 5s
  }

  particles SmokeEffect {
    type: 'cloud'
    target: 'air'
    color: '#69CCCC'
    count: 10
    velocity: [0, 0.5, 0]
    size: 0.3
    lifetime: 2s
    spread: 45
  }

  audio Crackling {
    src: 'campfire_crackling.mp3'
    position: [0, 1, 0]
    volume: 0.3
    loop: true
    spatial: true
    distance: 15
  }

  on interval 2s {
    emit('hearthwarm', player.id)
  }
}

samples.prompt: A grabbable magic crystal that glows when picked up
samples.code:
@object InteractiveItem
  model: "box"
  position: [0, 1, 0]
  scale: [0.5, 0.5, 0.5]
  material:
    color: "#3498db"
    metalness: 0.8
  grabbable: true
  onGrab: |
    this.material.emissive = "#ffffff"
  onRelease: |
    this.material.emissive = "#000000"

samples.prompt: A spinning portal gateway with purple energy effects that teleports players
samples.code:
@object Portal
  model: "torus"
  position: [0, 2, -5]
  scale: [2, 2, 0.2]
  material:
    color: "#9b59b6"
    emissive: "#8e44ad"
    transparent: true
    opacity: 0.7
  animation:
    property: rotation.z
    duration: 5000
    loop: true
    to: 6.28
  particles:
    type: "sparkle"
    count: 100
    color: "#e056fd"
  onEnter: |
    world.loadScene("destination")

samples.prompt: An NPC shopkeeper that greets players and shows dialog options
samples.code:
@object NPC_Brian
  model: "character/brian.glb"
  position: [2, 0, 3]
  scale: [1, 1, 1]
  animation: "idle"
  ai:
    enabled: true
    personality: "friendly"
  dialog:
    greeting: "Hey there! Welcome to Hololand!"
    options:
      - "Tell me about this place"
      - "What can I do here?"
      - "Goodbye"
  onInteract: |
    this.dialog.show()

samples.prompt: A magic sparkle particle effect with golden color
samples.code:
@particles MagicEffect
  position: [0, 1, 0]
  type: "points"
  count: 500
  size: 0.1
  color: 
    start: "#f39c12"
    end: "#e74c3c"
  lifetime: 2
  velocity: [0, 2, 0]
  spread: [1, 0.5, 1]
  blending: "additive"

samples.prompt: A cube that moves back and forth with smooth easing
A sphere that rotates smoothly forever
A zen garden with koi pond, stone lanterns, bamboo fence, and meditation platform
A door that slides open when approached and closes after player walks through
A holographic display screen with animated scan lines and pulsing glow
samples.code:
object HologramDisplay @grabbable @networked {
  geometry: 'cylinder'
  size: [2, 0.1, 2]
  material: 'hologram_frost'
  
  state scanLineCount: 15
  
  animation ScanLines {
    property: 'position.y'
    from: [-0.1, 0, -0.1]
    to: [0.1, 0, 0.1]
    duration: 2s
    loop: infinite
    direction: alternate
  }
}

samples.prompt: An ambient forest soundscape with bird chirps, wind, and distant waterfall
A floating cyan orb at eye level that can be grabbed
A throwable red cube and a teal cylinder button
A tilted gray ramp with red, blue, and green bouncy balls
A networked scene with player avatars and a synced red ball
A dark foggy room with four glowing colored puzzle buttons
TypeScript parser function for HoloScript orb definitions
React component for HoloScript object preview
TypeScript function to convert .holo AST to Three.js scene
A bouncy ball that changes color each time it bounces
A stackable crate that can be picked up and placed on other crates
An underwater coral reef with fish swimming, seaweed swaying, and bubbles rising
HoloScript template syntax for reusable object blueprints
HoloScript spatial_group syntax for object grouping
React component for rendering HoloScript scene tree
TypeScript trait validator for HoloScript objects
A lever that can be pulled to open a gate
A torch on a wall that flickers with fire particles and emits light
A floating platform that moves between two points carrying players
A neon cyberpunk city street with holographic signs and flying cars
A haunted mansion entrance with creaking door, fog, and floating candles
A bow and arrow that can be drawn back and fired at targets
A health potion bottle that heals the player when consumed
A piano keyboard that plays notes when keys are pressed
A slot machine with spinning reels that can be pulled to play
A vending machine with selectable items that dispenses products
An alien planet surface with purple sky, floating rocks, and bioluminescent plants
A magical spell casting effect with swirling energy orbs and light trails
TypeScript .holo file parser extracting composition, environment, and objects
React component for selecting VR traits with categories
